actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to release the lien for the estate tax on property which is transferred by the executor to a purchaser or holder of a security interest.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, for the release of the lien for the estate tax on property which is transferred by the executor to a purchaser or holder of a security interest. Provides that a like lien shall then attach to the proceeds of such a transfer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to release the lien for the estate tax on property which is transferred by the executor to a purchaser or holder of a security interest.
